titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation prohibiting the buying and selling of any of His Maiesties armes or munition, and to reforme the abuses committed at musters and traynings by borrowing of armes.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: White-Hall, this ninth day of March in the third yeere of His Maiesties reigne ..
Imprint from colophon; the publication year is given according to Lady Day dating.
Arms 12; Steele notation: His by 2) disobe- speciall.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
